thread.title: Ajmer to Pushkar: bus or private transport?
thread.title_full: Ajmer to Pushkar: bus or private transport?

author: IndiaInNovember
title: Ajmer to Pushkar: bus or private transport?
text: # 1 This November I'll be traveling from Jaipur to Pushkar during the Pushkar Camel Festival. I have a train ticket that takes me to nearby Ajmer, so my question is: how much hassle is getting from the train station to the bus to Pushkar, particularly during the camel festival? Would it be practical to hire a cab, and how much might this cost?
